{{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Hildigrim Took | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Great Smials]], [[Tuckborough]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1240}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SR|1341}} | deathlocation= | age=101 | notablefor= | family=[[Took Family|Took]] | parentage=[[Gerontius Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]] | siblings=[[Isengrim Took III|Isengrim]], [[Hildigard Took|Hildigard]], [[Isumbras Took IV|Isumbras]], [[Isembold Took|Isembold]], [[Hildifons Took|Hildifons]], [[Isembard Took|Isembard]], [[Hildibrand Took|Hildibrand]], [[Belladonna Took|Belladonna]], [[Donnamira Took|Donnamira]], [[Mirabella Took|Mirabella]] and [[Isengar Took|Isengar]] | spouse=[[Rosa Baggins]] | children=[[Adalgrim Took|Adalgrim]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Hildigrim Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Hildigrim was the third son of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]].
